üß† 3. Operational Pattern That Works Best


Hybrid cycle:


Claude CLI (Architect):
Drafts plan / flow diagram / task allocation.

Writes pseudo-code and defines evaluation metrics.

Codex CLI (Engineer):
Implements concrete code, scripts, and configs.

Emits diffs, patch files, and regression tests.

Claude CLI (Reviewer):
Validates outputs for coherence, completeness, and risk.

Summarizes progress into digest files.

Codex CLI (Integrator):
Commits tested artifacts back to repo, updates YAML indexes.


This loop allows Codex to handle deterministic tasks and Claude to manage reasoning, synthesis, and oversight ‚Äî mirroring how you‚Äôd pair a senior systems architect with a disciplined dev-ops engineer.
